arStrings.szText: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} or {c_important}Shadow Step{/c}, you leave behind a cluster of exploding {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
